snippet: In “To America With Love,” the British critic A. A. Gill tries to make up for other Britons’ grouchy attitude toward the United States with a frilly, funny valentine.
abstract: Michiko Kakutani reviews book To America With Love by A A Gill.
lead_paragraph: In “To America With Love,” the British critic A. A. Gill tries to make up for other Britons’ grouchy attitude toward the United States with a frilly, funny valentine.

headline.seo: ‘To America With Love,’ by. A. A. Gill
headline.main: A Rebellious Trans-Atlantic Infatuation: Take That, Mrs. Trollope!
headline.print_headline: A Rebellious Trans-Atlantic Infatuation: Take That, Mrs. Trollope!
